Symbol.Script_2D:
PEN gs_cont_pen FILL gs_fill_type
ADD2 a/2,b/2
HOTSPOT2 0,b/2 HOTSPOT2 0,0
if iCookTopType = COOKTOPTYPE_2 and iShapeType = SHAPETYPE_OVAL then r = (b^2 / 4)*(1000/(66*a)) POLY2_B 8,1+2,gs_fill_pen,gs_back_pen, -a/2,-b/2, 1, -a/2+(r-33*a/1000), 0, 900, -a/2, b/2, 3000+1, a/2, b/2, 1, a/2-(r-33*a/1000), 0, 900, a/2, -b/2, 3000+1, a/2, -b/2, 1, -a/2,-b/2,1
else POLY2_B 5,1+2,gs_fill_pen,gs_back_pen, -a/2,-b/2,1, a/2,-b/2,1, a/2,b/2,1, -a/2,b/2,1, -a/2,-b/2,-1
endif
ADD2 -a/2+a/6,0
temp_R=min(A/6,B/6)
if iCookTopType = COOKTOPTYPE_1 then for I=1 to 3 ADD2 0,b/4 CIRCLE2 0,0,temp_R del 1 ADD2 0,-b/4 CIRCLE2 0,0,temp_R del 1 ADD2 a/3,0 next I del 3 endif
if iCookTopType = COOKTOPTYPE_3 then for I=1 to 3 ADD2 0,b/4 CIRCLE2 0,0,temp_R del 1 ADD2 a/3,0 next I del 2 for j=1 to 2 ADD2 -a/3,-b/4 CIRCLE2 0,0,temp_R del 1 ADD2 a*2/3,0 next j del 2
endif
del 1
ADD2 -a/2+a/4,0
if iCookTopType = COOKTOPTYPE_2 then for I=1 to 2 ADD2 0,b/4 CIRCLE2 0,0,temp_R del 1 ADD2 0,-b/4 CIRCLE2 0,0,temp_R del 1 ADD2 a/3,0 next I del 2
endif
del top
CALL "Resize_A_B_ZZYZX" Parameters ALL
Symbol.Script_1D:
! const values for parameter: iCookTopType COOKTOPTYPE_1 = 1 COOKTOPTYPE_2 = 2 COOKTOPTYPE_3 = 3
! const values for parameter: iShapeType SHAPETYPE_RECT = 1 SHAPETYPE_OVAL = 2
th=1" x=(a-2*th)/3 y=(b-2*th)/2
Symbol.Script_VL:
call "FM_types" parameters all
VALUES "gs_detlevel_3D" `Detailed`,`Simple`,`Off` VALUES "gs_detlevel_3D_m" 2, 1, 0 values{2} "iCookTopType" COOKTOPTYPE_1, `Cooktop 1`, COOKTOPTYPE_2, `Cooktop 2`, COOKTOPTYPE_3, `Cooktop 3`
values{2} "iShapeType" SHAPETYPE_RECT, `Rectangular`, SHAPETYPE_OVAL, `Oval` VALUES "gs_resol" RANGE [3,)
lock "ZZYZX" parameters ac_bottomlevel = hCountertop - cookh if iCookTopType = COOKTOPTYPE_1 then parameters ZZYZX = cookh + .25 parameters ac_toplevel = hCountertop + 0.25 endif if iCookTopType = COOKTOPTYPE_2 then parameters ZZYZX = cookh + .028 parameters ac_toplevel = hCountertop + 0.028 endif if iCookTopType = COOKTOPTYPE_3 then parameters ZZYZX = cookh + .034 parameters ac_toplevel = hCountertop + 0.034 endif
if iCookTopType <> COOKTOPTYPE_1 then lock "bps"
if iCookTopType <> COOKTOPTYPE_2 then lock "iShapeType" hideparameter "iShapeType" endif
if iCookTopType <> COOKTOPTYPE_3 then LOCK "p_mat" HIDEPARAMETER "p_mat" endif
if gs_cont_pen=0 then PARAMETERS gs_cont_pen=4 if gs_fill_pen=0 then PARAMETERS gs_fill_pen=19
if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_detlevel_3D" then if gs_detlevel_3D = `Off` then PARAMETERS gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 if gs_detlevel_3D = `Simple` then PARAMETERS gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 if gs_detlevel_3D = `Detailed` then PARAMETERS gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 ELSE if gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 then PARAMETERS gs_detlevel_3D = `Off` if gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 then PARAMETERS gs_detlevel_3D = `Simple` if gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 then PARAMETERS gs_detlevel_3D = `Detailed` endif
if gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 then HIDEPARAMETER "gs_resol" if gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 then HIDEPARAMETER "gs_resol", "gs_shadow"
if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME="iCookTopType" then if iCookTopType = COOKTOPTYPE_1 then PARAMETERS A=1.5 , B=.9, cookh=0.15 endif if iCookTopType = COOKTOPTYPE_2 then PARAMETERS A=.9 , B=.540 endif if iCookTopType = COOKTOPTYPE_3 then PARAMETERS A=.88 , B=.5, cookh=0.08 endif endif
! ============================================================================= ! Onorm list Settings ! ============================================================================= if LibraryLangCode = "AUT" or LibraryLangCode = "CHE" or LibraryLangCode = "GER" then call "Onorm_Storage" parameters all else hideparameter "gs_onorm_Title" endif
Symbol.Script_FWM:
actualGUID = FROM_GUID
! ============================================================================== ! Subroutines ! ==============================================================================
_startID = "D9F0E36A-83C4-4B2C-AB8A-D07D72C14E43" _endID = "8461B31E-E1D8-406E-9642-B395B601D3C9" gosub "type_type2_CooktopsGas_fwm"
_startID = "8461B31E-E1D8-406E-9642-B395B601D3C9" _endID = "0888BB70-DD7C-4FE1-97FC-D5845E2868C2" gosub "fmtypes_fwm"
! ============================================================================== ! Set Migration GUID ! ==============================================================================
setmigrationguid actualGUID
! ============================================================================== end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! en ! ==============================================================================

Symbol.Script_BWM:
targetGUID = TO_GUID
! ============================================================================== ! Subroutines ! ==============================================================================
gosub "fmtypes_bwm"
gosub "type_type2_CooktopsGas_bwm"
! ============================================================================== ! Set Migration GUID ! ==============================================================================
setmigrationguid targetGUID
! ============================================================================== end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! en ! ==============================================================================
! ============================================================================== ! Change string parameter to integer ! ============================================================================== "type_type2_CooktopsGas_bwm": if targetGUID # "" then newparameter "type", "String" type = `Cooktop 1` if iCookTopType = COOKTOPTYPE_2 then type = `Cooktop 2` if iCookTopType = COOKTOPTYPE_3 then type = `Cooktop 3` parameters type = type
newparameter "type02", "String" type02 = `Rectangular` if iShapeType = SHAPETYPE_OVAL then type02 = `Oval` parameters type02 = type02
endif return
! ============================================================================== ! Change string parameter to integer ! ============================================================================== "fmtypes_bwm": if targetGUID # "" then if iFMType = 1 then FM_Type = `Default Objects` if iFMType = 2 then FM_Type = `Default Lamps` if iFMType = 3 then FM_Type = `People` if iFMType = 4 then FM_Type = `Elevators` if iFMType = 5 then FM_Type = `Security and Escapes` if iFMType = 6 then FM_Type = `Stairs` if iFMType = 7 then FM_Type = `Work Spaces` if iFMType = 8 then FM_Type = `Electric Facilities` if iFMType = 9 then FM_Type = `Distribution Panels` if iFMType = 10 then FM_Type = `Measuring Places` if iFMType = 11 then FM_Type = `Lamps` if iFMType = 12 then FM_Type = `HVAC Equipment` if iFMType = 13 then FM_Type = `Sanitation` if iFMType = 14 then FM_Type = `Locks` if iFMType = 15 then FM_Type = `Built-in Wardrobes` if iFMType = 16 then FM_Type = `Furniture` if iFMType = 17 then FM_Type = `Ceilings` if iFMType = 18 then FM_Type = `Floors` if iFMType = 19 then FM_Type = `Outdoor Objects` if iFMType = 20 then FM_Type = `Computers` if iFMType = 21 then FM_Type = `Monitors` if iFMType = 22 then FM_Type = `Software` if iFMType = 23 then FM_Type = `Phones` if iFMType = 24 then FM_Type = `Containers` if iFMType = 25 then FM_Type = `Others` parameters FM_Type = FM_Type
endif return
